text: Joseph Roger Bismuth (4 November 1926 – 1 October 2019) http://kapitalis.com/tunisie/2019/10/01/deces-de-roger-bismuth-homme- daffaires-et-ancien-president-du-comite-des-juifs-de-tunisie/ was a Tunisian businessman and senator. He was elected into the newly formed upper chamber, the Chamber of Advisors in July 2005 and was the only Jewish elected legislator in the Arab world. Senator Bismuth was also a member of the International Council of Jewish Parliamentarians. == Articles == *Jewish Legislators Build International Network *Jewish legislators network, learn, visit ailing Sharon *The International Council of Jewish Parliamentarians (ICJP) *Tunisia looking for ties with Israel ==References== Category:Jewish Tunisian politicians Category:1926 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Members of the Chamber of Advisors Category:Tunisian Jews
title: Joseph Bismuth
